title: Oceanear Tales
description: Oceanear TalesVolume 1DarklightIn a house on the newly built Hilltop estate, all is not as it seems. Becca and her house-mates, Phillip and Simon, are under attack from a psychic entity. But what does it want, and what does it have to do with the darklight hanging from Simon’s bedroom ceiling?Intrinsically WickedAfter being rescued by a land dweller, Aquarian, Isobel is grateful. But as she struggles to come to terms with her ferocious, sexual appetites, and learns of her betrayal, from those living above the sea, can she reason her kind’s genocide, or will she be forced into becoming, the very devil they already suspect her of being?
author: Nathan J.D.L. Rowark
